meanings.definition: A type of soup, typically made from shellfish
meanings.sent1: I ordered a bowl of bisques at the seafood restaurant.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes delicious bisques with fresh lobster.
meanings.sent3: The bisques were so tasty, they made the crab blush.
meanings.sent4: Her bisques were a warm hug on a cold winter day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the bisques filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A type of pottery with a smooth, unglazed matte finish
meanings.sent1: The artist displayed her beautiful bisques at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: I love collecting unique bisques for my home decor.
meanings.sent3: The bisques on the shelf seemed to whisper stories of ancient times.
meanings.sent4: The bisques in the sunlight gleamed like polished stones.
meanings.sent5: Her delicate fingers traced the curves of the bisques, feeling their smoothness.

meanings.definition: A type of color in the pinkish-orange range
meanings.sent1: She painted her room in lovely bisques and creams.
meanings.sent2: The sunset cast a beautiful bisques hue over the horizon.
meanings.sent3: The bisques of the sky reminded him of a creamsicle.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks turned a soft bisques color when she blushed.
meanings.sent5: The bisques of the flowers in the garden glowed in the evening light.
